name: Dredge Spring
description: <c=@flavor>A spring salvaged from a dredge machine.</c>

name: Iron Legion Gear
description: <c=@flavor>"The power of the charr comes from Iron Legion ingenuity."</c>

name: Meatoberfest Souvenir Spoon
description: <c=@flavor>"Meatoberfest—1325 AE"</c>

name: Engraved Longhorn
description: <c=@flavor>A horn awarded for a prize bull.</c>

name: Harpy Feathers
description:
"Harpy down makes a good pillow. It's soft and warm."
—Sagum Relicseeker

name: Crush Warband Honorary Patch
description: <c=@flavor>This badge is in inscribed with the words: "Honorary member of the Crush warband. Mightiest in the fahrar!"</c>

name: Cow Bell
description:
"Everyone says we need more of these. I think we've got enough."
—Mad Mardine

name: Durmand Priory Guide to Exorcism
description:
"The first page will give you nightmares, ask Abel."
—Scholar Worfmir

name: Sentinel Scout Badge
description:
"Thanks. You really helped us out."
—Sentinel Staggerfoe

name: Disarmed Mortar Shell
description:
"Just to remind the world what the Iron Legion is best at."
—Centurion Truthbringer

name: Ghostly Scrap Metal
description:
"I'm still not sure how 'ghostly' metal can exist..."
—Fyra

name: Barradin Family Crest
description: <c=@flavor>"The Barradin family crest is old but still strong and proud. You can still hear his roar echoing in the crypt."</c>

name: Heartwood Fragment
description:
"This comes straight from the heart. Ha! Get it?"
—Kona Timberrend

name: Grenade Pin
description: <c=@flavor>"Remember that time we threw grenades at drakes?"</c>

name: Obelisk Lightning Orb
description: <c=@flavor>"Why should it stay there shocking passersby when it can be put to good use?"</c>

name: Ascalonian Signet Ring
description: <c=@flavor>"The inscription inside the ring is too worn to be discernable."</c>

name: Separatist Wanted Poster
description: <c=@flavor>"Remember: 'dead or alive' means dead."</c>

name: Meatoberfest Souvenir Mug
description: <c=@flavor>"Meatoberfest—1325 AE"</c>

name: Ghostly Scrap Metal
description:
"I'm still not sure how 'ghostly' metal can exist..."
—Fyra

name: Broken Saw Tooth
description:
"These always break off at the worst possible time."
—Mara Ripsaw

name: Trusty Screw
description:
"When fighting ghosts, never leave home without a good screw."
—Zalvax

name: Ghostly Scrap Metal
description:
"I'm still not sure how 'ghostly' metal can exist..."
—Fyra

name: Skale Tag
description: <c=@flavor>"Skale number 354. Do not remove on penalty of death."</c>

name: Cappo Family Crest
description:
"Take one as a momento of the excavation."
—Magister Razermane

name: Skelk Training Whistle
description:
"Skelk love the sound of this thing."
—Skelk Wrangler

name: Ash Legion Crest
description: <c=@flavor>It looks like it's made to be easily hidden.</c>

name: Ring of Stonefall
description:
"This is a symbol of strength around here."
—Rak Deathmane

name: Flame Legion Crest
description: <c=@flavor>A souvenir from a Flame Legion battle.</c>

name: Crest of Nageling
description:
"No place like home."
—Kastaz

name: Effigy Horn
description: <c=@flavor>"After sifting through the ash, this was all that was still recognizable."</c>

name: Trebuchet Arming Crank
description: <c=@flavor>"You don't wanna know how many wrecked trebuchets I had to search through to find that."</c>

name: Blood Legion Primus Badge
description:
"By Bangar's blade!"
—Blood Legion

name: Devourer Toy
description:
"They love these sticks."
—Braxa Scalehunter

name: Cow Bell
description:
"Everyone says we need more of these. I think we've got enough."
—Mad Mardine

name: Sealed Iron Legion Ghost Trap
description: <c=@flavor>"Putting your ear close to it, you can hear something trying to get out."</c>

name: Iron Legion Primus Badge
description:
"Steel won't yield."
—Iron Legion

name: Meatoberfest Souvenir Mug
description: <c=@flavor>"Meatoberfest—1325 AE"</c>

name: Pyre Fierceshot Arrowhead
description: <c=@flavor>"This arrowhead once belonged to Pyre Fierceshot."</c>

name: Iron Shackles
description:
"We chain ourselves to fate by the decisions we make."
—Warden Scourgejaw

name: Wall Fragment
description:
"What is it with people collecting pieces of this ghost cursed wall? Stone is stone. I prefer it when its not in my way."
—Legionnaire Bladechipper

name: Mine Pin
description:
"Yes, mines have pins, too. It helps keep them from blowing up when carrying them."
—Tiga

name: Sentinel Survival Badge
description:
"Live to fight another day."
—Sentinel Jaggedclaw

name: Bent Nail
description:
"These always bring me good luck."
—Tamor Woodreave

name: Ring of Stonefall
description:
"This is a symbol of strength around here."
—Rak Deathmane

name: Gargoyle Fossil
description: <c=@flavor>A fossilized piece of a gargoyle.</c>

name: Skelk Training Whistle
description:
"Skelk love the sound of this thing."
—Skelk Wrangler

name: Ash Legion Primus Badge
description:
"When Swordshadow comes for you, may she leave you alive."
—Ash Legion

name: Devourer Toy
description:
"They love these sticks."
—Braxa Scalehunter

name: Battle of Granite Front Commendation
description:
"The Iron Legion is built with soldiers like you. Thank you."
—Helo Murkhaunt

name: Champion Plaque
description: <c=@flavor>"Champion of the Pit!"</c>

description: <c=@flavor>"A symbol of ogre friendship."</c>

name: Iron Legion Machine Gun Gear
description:

—Legionnaire Sleekfur

name: Ebonhawke Cease-Fire Agreement
description: <c=@flavor>This is a copy of the declaration of cease-fire between humans and charr, putting a pause on a war that has lasted for generations.</c>

description: <c=@flavor>"If only this ring could talk..."</c>

—Secret Code 872SQ

description:

—Legionnaire Neverburn

name: Tiny Pet Grub
description:
"Take good care of this tiny little friend."
—Tarstar Chief

name: Ancient Charr Decoder Ring
description: <c=@flavor>Decipher every Charr battle plan you find</c>

name: Preserved Red Iris
description: <c=@flavor>A beautiful red flower, treated to last forever.</c>

name: Scriptures of Dwayna
description:
"The writing in these are ancient and beautiful. Makes you wonder what else was lost when Ascalon fell."
—Jinell

name: Iron Legion Gunner's Ring
description:
"Looks like your heroics qualified you. You have the Iron Legion's thanks."
—Legionnaire Sleekfur

name: Thackeray Family Replica Ring
description: <c=@flavor>A replica of the Thackeray family ring.</c>

name: Shadowcleft Covert Operations Badge
description:
"Impressive."
—Solita Miststalker

name: Ancient Emerald Orrian Spoon
description:
"These are pretty. So pretty."
—Recruit Tochacatl

name: Ash Legion Covert Demolition Field Guide FM-29B
description:
"What you think you know can kill you just a quickly as what you don't."
—Sava Quicksnarl

name: Harpy Love Momento
description:
"As much as you try to understand it. Alchemically speaking, love is still a mystery, even to my genius intellect."
—Wode

name: Experimental Grenade Pin
description:
"This pin might be a little too tactical."
—Tactician Lyan

name: Flame Legion Carving
description:
"With a hero like you around, the Flame Legion doesn't stand a chance."
—Corva Sharpclaw

name: Peace Treaty Memo
description:
"Sometimes it's not what the leaders say publicly that shapes the outcome. A memo by an assistant can mean the difference between war and peace."
—Kai

name: Nrocroc Pressed Prickleberry Friendship Flower
description:
"You are true friend of the Nrocroc."
—Nrocroc Chief

name: Toy Stuffed Bear
description: <c=@flavor>A toy bear. Can be classifed as fuzzy, wuzzy.</c>

name: Shadowcleft Covert Operations Badge
description:
"Impressive."
—Solita Miststalker

name: Sweptweave Schematic
description:
"Everything starts with a plan, but nothing ever goes according to it."
—Torruh Sweptweave

name: Stone Of Rinn
description:
"Ghosts hate tresspassers, and the branded hate everything. Take some stones from one ruin, put it by some branded, and you'll have a battle in no time."
—Erria

name: Sentinel's Scout Badge
description:
"Thank you for your help. Your work helps us get rid of those trouble making inquest."
—Sentinel Liharn

name: Iron Legion Badge of Bravery
description:
"The Iron Legion thanks you. Maybe now we can get back to fixing up this blasted fort."
—Engineer Burlage Firestoker

name: Iron Legion Badge
description:
"That tar would set us back if not for your leadership. We have a fighting chance thanks to you."
—Legionnaire Kress Rustmaw

name: Ash Legion Compass
description:
"The mission isn't done until you come home."
—Brencis Quickblood

name: Ogre Pet Tags
description:
"They say the Ogres infuse these with some kind of magic. Thus the bond with their pets. We just collect them because it's fun."
—Avarr Sneakpaw

name: Tiny Crystal Shard
description:
"Those silly monkies will worship anything. Enjoy this tiny pockey sized "Star God"
—Olenn

name: Night Vision Enhancers
description:
"Darkness, like anything else, is best when its enhanced."
—Fina Duskmaker

name: Legionnaire Assault Badge
description:
"With a hero like you around the Flame Legion here wont last long."
—Legionnaire Neverburn

name: Ash Legion Covert Demolition Field Guide FM-29B
description:
"What you think you know can kill you just a quickly as what you don't."
—Sava Quicksnarl

name: Tar Removal Tool
description:
"These are far too dangerous to refill. It is nice to look at though. "
—Engineer Verutum

name: Kodan Enduring Scroll
description:
"Balance in all things."
—Enduring Protector

name: Wupwup God Icon
description:
"Great power in mountain skull. We make small mountain you hold in hand."
—Wupwup Chief

name: Signed Pact Agreement
description:
"We printed extra copies in case any disagreements came up in the field. This way we are all on the same page."
—Agent Crandle

name: Ash Legion Spy Ring
description:
"Flame. Dark. Shadow. Burn."
—Secret Code 872SQ

name: Wupwup God Icon
description:
"Great power in mountain skull. We make small mountain you hold in hand."
—Wupwup Chief

name: Bomb Fuse
description:
"Careful what sparks you create."
—Jahr Duskrend

name: Deno's Fish Hook
description:
"The trick is a little rabbit fur around the top, and tie it down with a little luck all around."
—Deno

name: Tiny Pet Grub
description:
"Take good care of this tiny little friend."
—Tarstar Chief

name: Letter Home
description:
"I don't ever open these, but maybe one day they will find their way to the right people. It might be morbid, but I look at it as a sign of hope."
—Arcanist Repth

name: Kodan Enduring Scroll
description:
"Balance in all things."
—Enduring Protector

name: Goldenlight Hallow Lab Test Results
description:
"Normally only krewe members get to see these, but seeing how you helped generate the more interesting data points you can have them."
—Krewe Leader Seesa

name: Flame Legion Carving
description:
"With a hero like you around, the Flame Legion doesn't stand a chance."
-Corva Sharpclaw

name: Wupwup Warthog Necklace
description:
"Friends of the Wupwup are friends of the warthog."
—Wupwup Chief

name: Wupwup Warthog Necklace
description:
"Friends of the Wupwup are friends of the warthog."
—Wupwup Chief

name: Golem Cannon Blueprint
description:
"In case I don't make it, this will prove I was a genius!"
—Explorer Trebb

name: Pressed Friendship Flower
description:
"Thank you friend of Degun Shun."
—Shelp

name: Order Of Whispers Tactical Operations Manual
description:
"Who ever planned this operation should have read this first—who destroys a perfectly good gate?"
—Agent Siobhan

name: Ash Legion Compass
description:
"The mission isn't done until you come home."
—Brencis Quickblood

name: Smashed Golem Crystal
description:
"These still have a little residual arcane energy. We are going to need every little magical scrap and crumb to defeat Zhaitan."
—Scholar Blix

name: Flashing Mine Blinker
description:
"Skritt rip these out of the mines all the time. Looks like this one survived the explosion. The skritt didn't."
—Faithspotter

name: Scout Commendation Letter
description:
"On behalf of the Sentinels, thank you."
—Fahrtak

name: Mechanical Golem Eye
description:
"So many shiny things when they blow up on landing."
—Explorer Grretergrret

name: Nrocroc Pressed Prickleberry Friendship Flower
description:
"You are true friend of the Nrocroc."
—Nrocroc Chief

name: Trebuchet Counterweight
description:
"The greater the strike, the greater the counterblow."
—Crusader Vilborg

name: Signed Pact Agreement
description:
"We printed extra copies in case any disagreements came up in the field. This way we are all on the same page."
—Agent Crandle

name: Lucky Rabbit's Foot
description:
"Poor rabbits. We will need more of this luck if we are to succeed."
—Lightbringer Ives

name: Pact Medal of Accommodation
description:
"We are still sorting this out and as you can see our award naming scheme could use some improvement. Thanks none the less."
—Lightbringer Surefoot

description:

description:

name: Priory Explorer's Medal
description:
"Pure fury, pure warrior wrath. Can you feel it?"

description:

name: Kamekeck War Paint
description:
"Most powerful paint. Powerful magic for powerful battle."

name: Hardened Tar Elemental Core
description:

name: Pact Medal Of Recognition
description:
